class.name: GodotInstance
class.brief_description: Provides access to an embedded Godot instance.
class.description: GodotInstance represents a running Godot instance that is controlled from an outside codebase, without a perpetual main loop. It is created by the C API [code]libgodot_create_godot_instance[/code]. Only one may be created per process.

method.name: focus_in
method.description: Notifies the instance that it is now in focus.

method.name: focus_out
method.description: Notifies the instance that it is now not in focus.

method.name: is_started
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if this instance has been fully started.

method.name: iteration
method.description: Runs a single iteration of the main loop. Returns [code]true[/code] if the engine is attempting to quit.

method.name: pause
method.description: Notifies the instance that it is going to be paused.

method.name: resume
method.description: Notifies the instance that it is being resumed.

method.name: start
method.description: Finishes this instance's startup sequence. Returns [code]true[/code] on success.
